last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wu Bi sees his cousin being kind to Su Yu and feels like something isn't right, so he warns Su Yu to keep his distance.

name: Stay With Me
overview: Su Yu, a high school student who lives a simple life with his father, faces a major change when his mother remarries a wealthy man, introducing him to his step-brother Wu Bi. Despite their initial differences-Wu Bi being a cold and arrogant top student, while Su Yu is an unreasonable underachiever-their relationship takes an unexpected turn after an accident. As they gradually warm up to each other, their bond grows stronger. However, when a heated fight arises, their true identities are revealed...

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Wu Bi switches schools and ends up in the same class as Su Yu, but the two of them don't hit it off when they first meet.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Wu Bi runs away from home and lives on his own because of a fight with his father, but because of this he meets a new friend.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Wu Bi realizes that the person who helped him move is actually Su Yu's father. Moreover, because of an accident, Wu Bi and Su Yu start to understand each other.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Wu Bi and Su Yu start sharing stories about their mothers, and Wu Bi also mentions a sculpture that looks just like Su Yu.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Wu Bi learns that Su Yu had a past relationship with a female classmate Ye Wanying, which makes Wu Bi extremely curious.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Wu Bi is worried that his lie will be discovered by Su Yu, so he thinks of a way to cover it up.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Su Yu accidentally realizes Wu Bi's secret, which leads to the relationship between them to reach a standstill.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A photo of Su Yu meeting his mother goes viral, which he blames on Wu Bi. As a result, the two of them get into a heated argument.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Su Yu sees that his dad has feelings for Auntie Zhou, so he gives his dad an idea.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Wu Bi rents a place near Su Yu's home, and apart from giving the rest of the family more living space, the two of them start living together.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Wu Bi's cousin returns from abroad, but it turns out that his cousin's girlfriend is actually Su Yu's old classmate Ye Wanying.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Wu Bi and Ye Wanying reach an agreement, but Ye Wanying uses other means to instigate drama between Wu Bi and Su Yu.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ye Wanying's lies are uncovered, and Su Yu says goodbye to her. Meanwhile, Su Yu questions his mother about the statue.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Wu Bi's father becomes enraged when learning that Wu Bi is living with Su Yu, and goes directly to Wu Bi to find out the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Su Yu's mother realizes that Duo Duo and her son are close, so she decides to figure out a way of getting closer to Duo Duo.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Wu Bi sees that Su Yu's father is having trouble finding the right storefront, so he secretly devises a plan to help.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: When Su Yu and his own mother start investigating the truth behind Wu Bi's mother's passing, more and more information comes to light.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Su Yu arrives at Wu Bi's uncle's residence, but has no way of getting inside.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Su Yu and Wu Bi celebrate each other's birthdays, and give each other special gifts.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Duo Duo finds a piece of paper within the statue that Wu Bi's mother made, and Su Yu and Wu Bi realize that it's an important piece of evidence.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Wu Bi accepts his cousin's request to go abroad, which results in him being forced to spend time apart from Su Yu.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Wu Bi successfully gets his drivers' license, and he and Su Yu go for a ride together to wherever Su Yu wants to go.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: In order for Wu Bi to get into a good school, Su Yu tutors him, but Wu Bi's cousin refuses to let go of Wu Bi's plans for the future.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Wu Bi sees his cousin being kind to Su Yu and feels like something isn't right, so he warns Su Yu to keep his distance.
